search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for APITemplate.io (apitemplateio.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page for APITemplate.io can be found at the following URL: [https://apitemplate.io/#pricing](https://apitemplate.io/#pricing)【3:0†source】.

Menu

Choose the perfect plan

##### Billed Annually

##### [**Image + PDF plans**](https://apitemplate.io/pricing/#mix) – For generating both images and PDF documents

##### [**PDF only plans**](https://apitemplate.io/pricing/#pdf) – Starting at $19, for generating PDF documents only

###### Looking for additional features or want a customized plan?Contact us at [\[email protected\]](https://apitemplate.io/cdn-cgi/l/email-protection).

\* Please email us for a signed DPA(Data Processing Agreement)

\*\*The prices($) are expressed in United States dollars(USD)

##### Looking for a additional features or want a customized plan? Contact us at [\[email protected\]](https://apitemplate.io/cdn-cgi/l/email-protection#630b060f0f0c2302130a17060e130f0217064d0a0c). Also, to find out more about other enterprise plans, please login and visit the subscription page.

**Pay-As-You-Go For Enterprise Plans**

For our enterprise plans, we support pay-as-you-go. With our pay-as-you-go feature, you no longer need to worry about running out of credit during an important project. To use this feature, first subscribe to a base enterprise subscription. You will only be invoiced for additional usage at the end of the billing cycle.

\*\*Note: This feature is not enabled by default. For more details, please email us at [\[email protected\]](https://apitemplate.io/cdn-cgi/l/email-protection)

FAQ(Frequently Asked Questions)
-------------------------------

We provide software-as-a-service (SaaS) and are based on a monthly subscription model. Each plan comes with an included number of templates, image conversions and other features. Please look at our [pricing](https://apitemplate.io/pricing/) section; you may cancel the subscription anytime.

Yes, we offer a free plan to new users, and a free plan has all the core functionality for you to evaluate. Depending on your usage, you may upgrade your plan.

Yes, of course!

**PDF** – You just need to know a little bit of HTML or Markdown to create PDF. In addition, we support WYSIWYG editor for PDF creation.

**Image(JPEG/PNG)** – Our image template editor supports drag and drop, no CSS/HTML is required.

It’s easy to create a new template based on the templates in our template library.

Other #nocode platforms such as Zapier may come in handy if you want to incorporate automation into your project. We also offer an Airtable integration, which allows you to import data and generate PDFs or images.

if you are an advanced user with programming skills, you may integrate your apps with our REST API.

**Image** – Our drag & drop image template editor provides an intuitive interface that allows you to easily create graphic content by adding visual elements and changing the text, position, or style.

**PDF** – We support Markdown, HTML and WYSIWYG editor to create PDF documents.

With our integrated API console, you can preview the image or PDF instantly.

On average, it takes about 1.2 seconds to 15 seconds. The loading time may also depend on the content you are trying to generate.

You will receive emails when the limit hit 80% and 100% of your credit for the month.

We do not automatically upgrade plans for you, you have to upgrade your plan by logging in and clicking “Subscription” and upgrade your plan.

For free accounts, the images will be purged after one year.

For paid accounts, the images/PDFs will continue to work for as long as you have a paid subscription.

Yes, once an image/PDF is generated, the downloads are unlimited.

Our data and applications are hosted with AWS (Amazon Web Services)

Customer Reviews
----------------

We have generated over 10 million PDF documents and images for our customers and partners.

See what our customers have to say

We are very grateful to Jacky and the team at APITemplate - their software has helped us to auto-generate high quality images for our student reports.

It has been the perfect fit for us as we grow our Oxford summer school.

![Image 2:  Jamie Dear](https://apitemplate.io/wp-content/uploads/2022/06/oxfordicon.png)

Jamie DearFounder

We've successfully automated YouTube thumbnails and match event creation for our Powerchair Football league using your templates. It integrates with our Postgres database on retool.com, is expanding to include league table graphics and match results.

Thanks to an AWS Inclusion and Diversity grant, we're enhancing our live-streaming workflow, further boosted by your product's automation capabilities.

We're grateful for your excellent service and wanted to share our positive experience.

![Image 3: Alex Dowding](https://apitemplate.io/wp-content/uploads/2022/06/Alt-WFA-Logo-df8bfe8d.png)

Alex DowdingVice Secretary

At askreferral.io, We are building referral networking platform for people to pitch and generate leads for different kinds of referrals, including, but not limited to job referrals, product referrals, funding referrals, realtor referrals etc.

Having a vibrant social media community is crucial for our growth and APITemplate.io played crucial role in automating generation of digital posters for job postings, profile pitches, funding requests etc, to help us grow from 0 to 200K+ followers in LinkedIn in less than one year.

![Image 4:  Nishitha Dhanekula](https://apitemplate.io/wp-content/uploads/2022/06/1711129638159-2.jpeg)

Nishitha DhanekulaCofounder /CTO

We've been using APITemplate.io to generate social images for our karting races and it's been a huge time-saver. The support team is super responsive and helpful - they quickly resolved an issue we encountered. We highly recommend this tool to anyone who needs a similar solution.

![Image 5:  Danaé Nicolas](https://apitemplate.io/wp-content/uploads/2022/06/ukart2.jpg)

Danaé NicolasCTO

APITemplate.io is such an easy application to use. Simple, intuititive, and code free. At simplehuman, we render all our commercial invoices, dispatch notes, and multiple other templates. The ability to create multiple layouts, and group them into a logical container - makes our lives much simpler.

This is a great tool to use, both affordable, and the support service turnaround time is second to none!

Defintely worth the subscription!

![Image 6:  Ryan Turnbull](https://apitemplate.io/wp-content/uploads/2022/06/ryan.jpg)

Ryan TurnbullIT Manager

Had an issue with template implementation via Make and reached out for support. Within minutes, I got a response and was soon on a Zoom call resolving it.

Despite the issue not being directly related to APITemplate.io, their team efficiently guided me to the right formatting. Many thanks!

![Image 7: Ron P.](https://apitemplate.io/wp-content/uploads/2022/06/2024-12-20_13-20-2.png)

Ron P.Product Manager

We have been using the service daily in our application for a year and are very satisfied with the reliability.

It meets all our requirements and requests for changes/improvements can be discussed directly with Jacky 1:1.

Thanks and greetings from Germany

![Image 8: Nicholas Gertz](https://apitemplate.io/wp-content/uploads/2022/06/finmatch.de_.jpg)

Nicholas GertzProduct Owner

We use APITemplate to generate key documentation we need to work with our industry partners.

We are building a digital solution in an antiquated industry, which means we need to communicate data to our partners in the format that they are accustomed to (pdf forms).

APITempate makes it easy for us to do this!

![Image 9:  Lucas Fridman](https://apitemplate.io/wp-content/uploads/2022/06/navigo-profile.jpeg)

Lucas Fridman Chief Product Officer

We love APITemplate.io for its simplicity and ease of use. Just setup once and "forget" about it due to its fabulous 3rd party integration.

New features are regularly added, and reasonable custom requests are honoured within days.

![Image 10: Jean-Paul Horn](https://apitemplate.io/wp-content/uploads/2022/06/iculture.nl-optimized.jpg)

Jean-Paul HornPublisher

APITemplate.io is one of the best services I have worked with in a very, very long time. They are super responsive and a joy to work with.

If you are struggling with PDF's, like I was, check 'em out!

![Image 11: Kevin Frickē](https://apitemplate.io/wp-content/uploads/2022/06/kevin.jpg)

Kevin Frickē

We run conferences with a number of speakers, each requiring an individual speaker profile. We used to create all of these profiles manually, but by incorporating APItemplate into our Zapier workflow, our team can generate a complete image with all of the speakers information in one click.

Using the template editor is a bit of a learning curve, but the support team is very responsive and helpful.

![Image 12: Jacob Monash](https://apitemplate.io/wp-content/uploads/2022/06/jacob2.png)

Jacob MonashAutomation Specialist

APITemplate.io is great. I love being able to quickly use HTML and CSS templates with dynamic variables to create documents.

Support is also fast and responsive.

Great vendor!

![Image 13: George Cooper](https://apitemplate.io/wp-content/uploads/2022/06/George-profile-optimized.png)

George Cooper\-

pricing_data.pricing_notes: Annual plans offer up to 20% savings compared to monthly billing. Enterprise plans support pay-as-you-go for additional usage.
